metadata.title: CVE-2023-52459 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: v4l: async: Fix duplicated list deletionThe list deletion call dropped here is already called from thehelper function in the line before. Having a second list_del()call results in either a warning (with CONFIG_DEBUG_LIST=y):list_del corruption, c46c8198->next is LIST_POISON1 (00000100)If CONFIG_DEBUG_LIST is disabled the operation results in akernel error due to NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
